rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0001
rows.name:
I have to say,
when you look at it, Superbia's capital
city is really thriving.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0002
rows.name: It's very different from Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0003
rows.name: ...Is that how you see it, Nia?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0004
rows.name: Of course it is.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0005
rows.name:
Your technology is so much more
advanced than Gula's, and you've
got army facilities, hot springs...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0006
rows.name:
If you ask me,
it seems like there wasn't any real
need for you to bother conquering Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0007
rows.name:
...Superbia, because of its geography,
has quite a hot climate.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0008
rows.name:
We developed by actively exploiting
technology which uses the heat, as well
as that we obtained through salvage.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0009
rows.name:
However, as the Divine Beast nears the
end of its life, the geothermal
temperature has been increasing.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0010
rows.name:
Ironically, our geothermal energy
technology has advanced
even further, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0011
rows.name:
Our agricultural yields have
been continuously decreasing.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0012
rows.name: The Divine Beast's lifetime, huh...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0013
rows.name:
Yes, in the near future,
it's likely that people won't be able to
live on Superbia's Divine Beast anymore.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0014
rows.name:
When the Senate leaders understood this,
they initiated a war of conquest
to secure a new place to live.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0015
rows.name: ...So that's why they targeted Gula?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0016
rows.name: ...Yes, that's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0017
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0018
rows.name: Wasn't there a better way?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0019
rows.name: They didn't need to be so stubborn.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0101
rows.name: ...Is that so? What would you suggest?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0102
rows.name:
If the leaders of both countries had
discussions, learned about each other,
and built a good relationship...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0103
rows.name:
They could have found ways
to help each other out,
couldn't they?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0104
rows.name:
Even we were enemies at first,
but now we're allies fighting
side by side.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0105
rows.name:
If they could have worked together
like that, there might have been
no need for war at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0106
rows.name: ...You have a point.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0107
rows.name:
If everyone in the world
thought like you, there probably
wouldn't be any conflicts.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0108
rows.name:
That's why...
it's too soon to give up,
don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0109
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0110
rows.name:
If conflict isn't necessary,
we should just get rid of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0111
rows.name:
Rex mentioned it, didn't he?
That if we reach the World Tree,
we might be able to end all fighting.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0112
rows.name:
So if we can reach Eden,
there would be no more need
for conflict...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0113
rows.name:
I don't care if someone laughs
at it as a fairy tale...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0114
rows.name:
It's far more constructive than
just being negative about how the world
is now, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0115
rows.name: ...Hehe, indeed.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0116
rows.name:
For that purpose too,
please lend us your strength, Meleph.
We're really counting on you.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0117
rows.name:
Indeed, I shall demonstrate
the full power of my blade,
renowned as the finest in the empire.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0201
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0202
rows.name:
They should have swallowed their
pride and asked for help.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0203
rows.name:
Like not wanting to reveal weakness,
or wanting to have an advantage
over the other side...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0204
rows.name:
It's because you're always thinking
about such things that you're trying to
occupy other countries, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0205
rows.name:
Going to war and causing more harm
is completely counterproductive,
don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0206
rows.name:
If your country doesn't have
enough food...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0207
rows.name:
You could have just asked politely,
'Could you spare some for us?'

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0208
rows.name:
Even former enemies like us
were able to understand
each other...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0209
rows.name:
There's no way government leaders
couldn't grasp something so basic,
is there?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0210
rows.name:
You're right about that...
But the world is rarely so simple.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0211
rows.name:
The reality is that even such
simple things cannot be done.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0212
rows.name: Seriously, people are such a hassle...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0213
rows.name: Yeah, indeed...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0214
rows.name:
That's exactly why I want to support
someone as straightforward
as that young man.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0215
rows.name: You mean Rex?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0216
rows.name:
A world without conflict...
How magnificent it would be
if that could become reality.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0217
rows.name: If anyone can achieve that, it's him.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0218
rows.name:
Because in every era,
people like him have blazed new trails.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0219
rows.name:
Well... That's surprising.
I always thought of you as more of a
straight-laced type, Meleph...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0220
rows.name:
So you actually believe
in the Eden legend?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0221
rows.name:
Chasing dreams isn't exclusively
for the young, you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0223
rows.name:
I'm traveling with you precisely
because I want to see where this
idealistic journey of yours leads.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0224
rows.name:
Well, regardless of your reasons,
having you as an ally is reassuring,
Meleph.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0225
rows.name:
You're the finest Driver in the empire,
after all.
We're counting on you.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0226
rows.name: Yes, leave it to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0227
rows.name:
No matter how challenging the journey,
I will certainly forge a path forward.
